main.com.univlr.commons.behaviours

Class StateChartBehaviour

  • java.lang.Object
    • jade.core.behaviours.Behaviour
      • jade.core.behaviours.SimpleBehaviour
        • jade.core.behaviours.CyclicBehaviour
          • main.com.univlr.commons.behaviours.StateChartBehaviour
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class StateChartBehaviour
extends jade.core.behaviours.CyclicBehaviour
    Represents the behaviour of a state chart. This behaviour uses an XML file in input to dynamically load the states and transitions. It uses a StateChartState to perform the different required actions.
    Author:
    Antoine Orgerit
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

                           java.lang.String name,
                           java.lang.String filename)
        Constructor of the StateChartBehaviour.
        Parameters:
        agent - the JADE Agent using the behaviour
        name - the name of the model that the behaviour has to keep track in the XML file
        filename - the name of the XML file to use

        public void action()

      • generateFirstState

        private void generateFirstState()
                         throws StateChartBehaviourException
        Allows to generate the first state of the StateChartBehaviour.
        Throws:
        StateChartBehaviourException - if an error occurred during the state generation from the XML file

      • getNextState

        private StateChartState getNextState()
                              throws StateChartBehaviourException
        Retrieves the next possible state according to the current StateChartState possible transitions. If more than one transition is possible, then a random one is selected.
        Returns:
        the next state from the current one as a StateChartState
        Throws:
        StateChartBehaviourException - if an error occurred while retrieving the possible next states from the XML document, or while evaluating the possible transitions

      • getPossibleStates

        private java.util.List<StateChartState> getPossibleStates()
                                                   throws StateChartBehaviourException
        Retrieves the possible next states according to the current StateChartState possible transitions. The possibility of a transition is based on the next possible states invariant evaluation.
        Returns:
        the possible states from the current one as a List of StateChartState
        Throws:
        StateChartBehaviourException - if an error occurred while evaluating the transitions from the current state

      • log

        private void log(java.util.logging.Level level,
                 java.lang.String message)
        Allows to log a message to the JADE Logger.
        Parameters:
        level - the level of the logged message as a Level
        message - the message to log as a String

      • convertXMLState

        private void convertXMLState(org.w3c.dom.Node state)
                      throws javax.xml.bind.JAXBException
        Allows to convert a DOM XML state representation to a StateChartState.
        Parameters:
        state - the DOM XML state to convert as a Node
        Throws:
        javax.xml.bind.JAXBException - if an error occurred while unmarshalling the DOM XML state node to the StateChartState

      • validateXML

        private void validateXML()
                  throws StateChartBehaviourException
        Allows to validate the XML file in entry of the StateChartBehaviour with the StateChartSchema.xsd file.
        Throws:
        StateChartBehaviourException - if an error occurred while setting the validator, or while validating the XML file with the schema

      • validateFunctionsReceiveDefinition

        private void validateFunctionsReceiveDefinition(org.w3c.dom.Document doc)
                                         throws StateChartBehaviourException
        Allows to validate if every receive function defined in the XML document is included in a NOT element.
        Parameters:
        doc - the DOM Document on which to validate the property
        Throws:
        StateChartBehaviourException - if an error occurred while retrieving the receive functions in the document, or if a receive function is not declared in a NOT element in the XML document

      • loadDocument

        private org.w3c.dom.Document loadDocument()
                                   throws StateChartBehaviourException
        Allows to load the DOM document representation of the XML file in entry of the StateChartBehaviour.
        Returns:
        the DOM document representation of the XML file in entry of the behaviour as a Document
        Throws:
        StateChartBehaviourException - if an error occurred while validating the XML, or while reading the file, or while parsing the XML file
